code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{connect}from'react-redux';import{addPost}from'../../actions/post';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PostForm=_ref=>{let{addPost}=_ref;const[text,setText]=useState(' ');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-primary p",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Say Something..."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form my-1",onSubmit:e=>{e.preventDefault();addPost({text});setText(' ');},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"text",cols:"30",rows:"5",placeholder:"Create a post",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-dark my-1",value:"Submit"})]})]});};export default connect(null,{addPost})(PostForm);
